the MS-105
Interconnects without tools, soldering
• Eliminates patching • Mounts on a table or
in 7” rack, deskarm or turret • Compressor
• Operator/announcer capability • Paging,
slating, intercom • ’Speaker muting • Cue to
booth and stage from 5 sources • Ducking:
Announcements automatically reduce program
level • Test Oscillator; slating cuetone

send • Warning-lite actuator • Audition • 2
variable equalizers • Group Submastering

phones and/or speaker • Ideal for mobile use.
